name: Snuggle Blanket
description:
There's no need to get out of bed when you can wear a blanket all day. These incredibly comfy and soft hooded blankets are the perfect choice for cozy days at home. The 100% polyester fabric ensures durability through regular wear. We'll print your original designs onto the front of the blanket in vibrant colors and high resolution. Choose between the two inner lining options – microfleece or sherpa.

.: Material: 100% polyester micro-mink outer fabric
.: One size: 80" × 55" (203 x 140 cm)
.: Two lining options: ultra soft microfleece or plush polyester sherpa
.: Seam thread color automatically matched to design
.: Elastic straps on the inside
.: One-sided print

name: Rainbow Tie-Dye Hoodie Cloak Blanket: A Vibrant Thank You for Your Festival Companions
description:
Express your gratitude with our Rainbow Tie-Dye Hoodie Cloak Blanket. This vibrant piece, adorned with a heartfelt 'Thank You for Just Being There', is a perfect way to show appreciation to your festival companions. More than just a colorful fashion statement, it's a cozy blanket perfect for those cool festival nights. Wrap yourself in its warmth while dancing to your favorite tunes, use it as an extra layer in your tent, or spread it out for a spontaneous picnic amidst the festival buzz. With this Rainbow Tie-Dye Hoodie Cloak Blanket, you're not just attending a festival - you're celebrating the love and joy of togetherness in comfort and style.

  80" × 55"
Length, in 79.92
Width, in 55.12

name: Inferno Flow Hoodie Blanket
description:
DWrap yourself in warmth and fiery style with the "Inferno Flow Hoodie Blanket." Featuring a dynamic swirl of red, orange, and purple tones, this blanket brings the heat with its vibrant, molten design. Perfect for cozy nights in, festivals, or chilly outdoor adventures, this hoodie blanket combines comfort and bold fashion effortlessly. Made from ultra-soft, plush fabric, it’s designed to keep you warm while turning heads. Ignite your relaxation time with this stunning, statement-making hoodie blanket!

.: One size: 80" × 55" (203 x 140 cm)
